title: Ring of Fire - September 28 2013
description:
September 28, 2013
Ring of Fire 
Hosted by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Mike Papantonio and Sam Seder


This week on Ring of Fire Radio: 


Hour 1: News stories that the corporate media news ignored with author Cliff Schecter.


Hour 2: Peter Beinart from The Daily Beast will discuss the emerging generation of progressives, and why they will change the face of American politics. And economics professor William Black will tell us why the Obama administration continues to push discredited and dangerous economic policies.


Hour 3: And investigative journalist David Dayen will tell us about the latest scams from the mortgage industry. And author Michael Klare will be here to tell us why we havenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t seen a renewed push for renewable energy, even as our planet burns up.
